item.title: Research
item.description: Research Interests My research interests are currently focused on comparative political behavior & institutions, quantitative methods, and formal theory. My research specifically looks at ways in which institutional arrangements (e.g. voting systems, government type, etc.) influence voters in democracies. Works in Progress The Effects of Compulsory Voting: A Case Study in Karnataka, India with Shane P. Singh Modeling Ideological Polarization: Spatial Modeling of Ideological Shifts Predicting Coalition Formation Using Notions of p-adic distance

item.title: Teaching
